content.raw:
The test passes on my local machine, but it fails on jenkins:

* [homebrew jenkins job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/419/testReport/junit/%28root%29/SVGLoader/LoadPaths/)
* [trusty jenkins job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/492/testReport/junit/%28root%29/SVGLoader/LoadPaths/)

~~~
73: [ RUN      ] SVGLoader.LoadPaths
73: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/gazebo/common/SVGLoader_TEST.cc:75: Failure
73: Value of: p2.polylines[0].size()
73:   Actual: 1
73: Expected: 61
73: [  FAILED  ] SVGLoader.LoadPaths (0 ms)
~~~
content.html:
The test passes on my local machine, but it fails on jenkins:

  • trusty jenkins job
